page.title: 06AN EIGHT YEAR OLD'S DAY (1)
page.content: {A school day} I get up at half-past seven.I get dressed and have a wash. Then I have breakfast, pack my bag and go to school. The bell goes at nine o'clock. We have the register and then go to assembly. We sing hymns and have a story. After assembly we do Maths or English for an hour. We have a playtime and after that we do Maths or English depending on what we did before play. At twelve o'clock we have dinner. We come back in the class at half past one and do topic, craft, music, hymn practice or games. We have playtime at half past two. Then we work until half past three and finish with a story. At home I have tea, change my clothes and then I might go out to play, or to Cubs or Brownies or swimming. I go to bed between nine and ten o'clock.
